name: Into The Night
description:
You're a monster hidden in the dark. Shake the children toyboxes, avoid teddy bears long enough to wake up tired parents and scare them too!

Move = Arrows (keyboard/gamepad)

Made for CFGJ#1 ("Construct French Game Jam #1" July 19-20th 2014) with Construct 2 Pro + Photoshop CS2 + Beepola.
